definition: United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)

definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
